io.micronaut.configuration.archaius1

Class EnvironmentConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.configuration.event.EventSource
      • org.apache.commons.configuration.AbstractConfiguration
        • io.micronaut.configuration.archaius1.EnvironmentConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.event.ApplicationEventListener<io.micronaut.runtime.context.scope.refresh.RefreshEvent>, java.util.EventListener, org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration

    @Singleton
public class EnvironmentConfiguration
extends org.apache.commons.configuration.AbstractConfiguration
implements io.micronaut.context.event.ApplicationEventListener<io.micronaut.runtime.context.scope.refresh.RefreshEvent>
    Adapts the Environment to the AbstractConfiguration type and fires change events when the application is refreshed.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
